name: Captain Geoffrey's Woodland Walk, Dudmaston Estate

ai.summary: A challenging 16.4 km woodland hike at Captain Geoffrey's Woodland Walk, Dudmaston Estate in the UK. The route blends shaded forest paths with occasional open sections and steady elevation, offering immersive woodland scenery within a historic estate setting.
ai.terrain_summary: Trail surfaces vary from packed earth and gravel to leaf litter and muddy patches; expect uneven ground, exposed roots, damp sections, and occasional steeper ascents, with most of the route shaded by trees.
ai.safety_notes: Plan for 4–6 hours depending on pace. Wear sturdy waterproof footwear and long trousers to guard against roots and brambles. Check current conditions and daylight hours, as UK weather can change quickly. Carry a map or GPS and a charged phone; stay on marked paths. Exercise extra care on wet or muddy sections, as they can be slippery. Inform someone of your plans and expected return time. Respect estate rules and wildlife, and be mindful of gates and other visitors.
recommended_gear: Sturdy waterproof footwear with good grip
Map and/or fully charged smartphone with offline map
Walking poles (optional but helpful on uneven terrain)
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn; suitable year-round with appropriate clothing and planning.

seo.title: Captain Geoffrey's Woodland Walk, Dudmaston Estate – 16.4 km Hard Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Tackle Captain Geoffrey's Woodland Walk at Dudmaston Estate. A 16.4 km hard hike through UK woodland with varied terrain, safety tips, and gear recommendations.
